ygData.subject: Re: Bind Affinity Spell
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You can bind yourself anywhere, city or not.  Other people you can only bind to city areas. ... I haven t purchased this spell, as it seems completely
ygData.messageBody:
> Can any of my elder brethren tell me if Bind Affinity will
> work in any
> zone, or only in major cities? I am level 11 now and hope
> to be binding
> soon.

You can bind yourself anywhere, city or not. Other people you can
only bind to city areas.


> Also, can anyone tell me where I can find Eye of Zomm
> in Qeynos? I
> just want to increase my conjuration skill, which is at
> "awful" level.

I haven't purchased this spell, as it seems completely useless except
for increasing Conjuration. My guess is that you will find it in the
Guild of mages OR in the Temple of Life. If not there, take the boat
to Erudin, it should be available in the Library or one of the
spellcasters' towers.
Aznyin
Level 16 Erudite Wizard
Chivalric Order of Norrath
Current Residence: Rivervale [Solusek Ro]
